subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Yovani Gallardo was the second straight pitcher to flirt with a no-hitter at Busch Stadium, allowing only a single to start the eighth inning for a complete game victory over the Cardinals.
snippet: Yovani Gallardo was the second straight pitcher to flirt with a no-hitter at Busch Stadium, allowing only a single to start the eighth inning for a complete game victory over the Cardinals.
